website_summaries.verdict: An affordably priced penguin-shaped pool cleaner that is designed for use with above-ground pools.
pros: The unit is easy to set up and comes with interchangeable parts so you can customize the look of your penguin
Hayward's Smart-Drive steering system allows the device to clean your flat-bottom pool in about two hours
cons: The effectiveness of this automatic pool cleaner depends on the power of your pump
If it's not strong enough, you may be disappointed

customer_reviews.title: This item ripped my pool liner.
customer_reviews.text: This item ripped my pool liner. I only used it twice. My above ground pool is only 4 years old and the liner was in perfect condition. I called Amazon and they three-way called In The Swim Pool Supplies with me. In The Swim Pool Supplies was not willing to assist with replacing the liner or any other form of help. Very disappointed in the product, In The Swim Pool Supplies, and everyone involved.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the bottom clean and free of even the smallest debris
customer_reviews.text: This little guy has done an amazing job getting and keeping our pool clean. A week ago, you couldn’t see the bottom. The combination of good chemicals and this cleaner you can see it is crystal clear and sparkling clean. We had to do a little improvising to hook it up to our pool. My handy husband drilled a hole in the cap that came with the pool and inserted a cone adapter. We could then could hook the cleaner to the cone adapter. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: GA DJM

customer_reviews.title: Husband hates this design
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was purchasing something that would meet the needs of our pool maintenance. My Husband does not like this at all. He had utilized a different style for years & 'I' thought it was time for something that I considered a much better approach to cleaning our Pool. However, 'IF' it isn't broke, don't buy something because it appears to be better. The standard design that He was using is a much better way to clean your pool ....not these cute items. We will be purchasing the style he had before, because .....IT WORKS BETTER!
customer_reviews.author: MKW

customer_reviews.title: Not really impressed
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say that I am really impressed with my Penguin Pool Cleaner. If you have any sort of semi-strong outlet or current going and it grabs the hose off penguin goes sideways, tipping over and never corrects itself. Maybe if it was a little heavier that wouldn't happen. I'm finding that I have to go correct it every 15 min or so to make sure it's doing what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S.

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: This product was a total let down. There is no suction, it moves so slowly you wonder if it is moving at all. If you have any small wrinkles in your pool it will not go over them at all. This was not worth 25 dollars, let alone what it really cost. If I could give this product 0 stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: angela holmes

customer_reviews.title: Poor advertising!!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t even give this a star but I had to choose one... I order this bc my friend has one similar and said it was great.. I didn’t see anywhere in the details about a pump size you need for this vacuum to work properly... my pump is apparently to small for this to work in my pool.. the saler will only give me half refund with original packaging and all manuals.. it’s been used 1 time I bought it 3 weeks ago.. I have none of that .. I order from amazon a few times a week and I am very disappointed with this purchase and saler!!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Abshire

customer_reviews.title: Cleans the pool great!
customer_reviews.text: Once you figure out how to get the right suction (you have to turn the penguin up side down to get out all the air) he takes off at the bottom of the pool. It's pretty time consuming assembling and disassembling all the tubes before and after but it beats having to manually vacuum the pool floor. Does a great job in navigating the entire pool floor. I've used it all Summer long and very happy with my purchase. It allows me to do other things instead of doing necessary pool maintenance. Loved my penguin pool cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Diaz

customer_reviews.title: We use in an in ground pool... Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy has made our lives much easier. We use him in our inground fiberglass pool and he does an amazing job. Saves us hours of daily work and keeps our pool looking great! Pool only goes from 3 1/2 feet to 5 1/2 feet and he can manage that small change well. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Cheap hose
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum is great and cleans the pool, however, the hose that is included had one section that unraveled right out of the box and we are unable to use it so it does not reach the other side of the pool. I contacted the company and they cannot replace that one piece, i would have to send the entire unit back to get that replacement hose piece. I wont be going through the packaging and running it to the closest ups store that is 25 min away from me. I will just pay someone else for a replacement piece. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Very good value.  Learn how to clean it.
customer_reviews.text: Works really good. Newer models are the same just more expensive. This will stop moving if it gets sand or grit into the moving parts. Generally it gets jammed after drying out. You'll need to become familiar with how to disassemble it to clean it out.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Pickles

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used Hayward products for cleaning my pool for over 10 years and have never had a problem. They work as the ad describes and do a thorough job. Thanks to Hayward fro great products!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner pool, happy owners
customer_reviews.text: So easy to get the vacuum going, out pool is cleaner with less time spent on it. My 4 year old loves to watch the penguin “swim” before or after it’s his turn In the pool.
customer_reviews.author: tripletmomma

customer_reviews.title: Beats a hand vac hands down!
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaner. Only obstacle to excellent all around performance is small hickory nuts and acorns get stuck in the intake. Once that happens it is necessaryto take the cleaner out of the pool and clear the obstruction. To avoid this a leaf net needs to be used to scoop up all small debris.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Owens

customer_reviews.title: Dumb penguin
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this would do that trick. It seemed ok the first time I used it but the second time it just kept getting stuck at the wall and not doing anything. I checked the suction and it was good so not sure what the problem is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price it is a great product.
customer_reviews.text: I just assembled this little guy in my above ground pool today. My 5 year old got a kick out of how cute he is. It was super easy to assemble and does a great job cleaning. The leaf collector attachment does not come with it. This is an optional feature.
customer_reviews.author: Mother Hen

customer_reviews.title: Help!!!
customer_reviews.text: First time in three years my pool turned green. Didn't happen till I bought this product...
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a month. Doesn’t move, gets stuck. Doesn’t suction. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: Loved it...now, not so much
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on Feb 20, 2020 and put into operation March 1. Worked great...until April 10. Now doesn't work at all. For nearly $200 got less than 2 months of light use out of it. Contacted seller for warranty information, waiting on reply.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson K.

customer_reviews.title: Works great if you have the right filter
customer_reviews.text: We use this on an above ground 26 foot round pool. Works great if you plug the other suction hole. We had to use a funnel to make shift the tube to fit in our suction hole.
customer_reviews.author: Leticha

customer_reviews.title: Works quickly and efficiently!!
customer_reviews.text: I freakin LOVE this!! Works great even with lower pressure!! However I have super small pebbles outside the pool so they often get in the pool and one got jammed in the gears but super easy fix!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie King

customer_reviews.title: seems good
customer_reviews.text: ive only used it once it dec/Jan. it was hard to get going with just one person but it seems to cover well.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Super time saver
customer_reviews.text: Saves a ton of time, and the grandkids love to watch it running around the bottom of the pool.
customer_reviews.author: David Fenton

customer_reviews.title: We named him Waldo
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that the stickers for his eyes would not peel off of the paper, so he has no eyes. Other than that he works great. We have a vinyl above ground pool and he does a really good job. Very Happy
customer_reviews.author: Stacy m.

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum, affordable price / I THOUGHT!
customer_reviews.text: Very reasonably priced, and a very awesome vacuum. Plus it’s cute! UPDATE: QUIT WORKING WITHIN 6 MONTHS!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Salters

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: So far this penguin has worked great! The only trouble I have is the return water jet pushes him more to one side of the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner for the money
customer_reviews.text: Second one of these cleaners I have owned. The first on lasted 15 years (with a couple re-builds). It works great on my vinyl liner pool. Easy to use, easy to fix, if you need to, and it's cute. Grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Steele

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised how great this works. I let it run whenever we are not swimming and the pool has been spotless all summer. I wish I had know about this years ago!
customer_reviews.author: djc

customer_reviews.title: IT IS A HORRIBLE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: It hardly moves on the floor of the pool and constantly gets stuck against the wall. Wish I could get a refund
customer_reviews.author: BilliJo Reddig

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item it worked great the first time I used it. After that it just sits in one place. I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: PHYLLIS

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy does a great job. He has been worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Andres J White

customer_reviews.title: Guy in a tux cleans your pool.
customer_reviews.text: I love penguins so it was an easy sell for me. It operates very well. It keeps the bottom of my pool very clean. Very fun to watch.
customer_reviews.author: John R

customer_reviews.title: ... thrilled that not only does it work well it’s pretty easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I’m thrilled that not only does it work well it’s pretty easy to use. I’d recommend getting the leaf catcher though
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C

customer_reviews.title: Best pool vacuum at a great price!!  Buy this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This pool vacuum made our pool cleaning easy! It does a great job and is very easy to use!! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You may need to purchase additional hose.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product. Works great easy to put togey
customer_reviews.author: Terry K Ostrander

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this item. It does what it says. My pool is clean and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Very reasonable and does a grear job.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and the easy setup. It also cleans my 16 X 24 ft oval pool quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Winter

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The hose need more twisting/flexibility at the joints of connection
customer_reviews.author: Loyd Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't live without it
customer_reviews.text: We love our little Penelope... she happily works to keep our pool looking good.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Marland

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, great price and fast service.
customer_reviews.author: coyotehunter67

product_meta.title: Hayward 100 Penguin Suction Above-Ground Pool Cleaner (Automatic Pool Vacuum)
product_meta.description: The Penguin Automatic Pool Cleaner from Hayward features the patented Smart-Drive programmed steering system to quickly and thoroughly clean your flat-bottom or dished out above ground pool floor in two hours or less. Simply plug the vacuum hose into the swimming pool skimmer, and let this automatic pool cleaner go to work. Dirt, leaves, grass, seeds and bugs are vacuumed up from the swimming pool floor, leaving your water crystal clear and ready for swimming. The Penguin installs in minutes on steel wall above ground pools with no tools required. Customize your Penguin Cleaner using 3 different colored bow-ties and eye sticker sets that are included. Note: Not compatible with Soft-Sided above ground pools. Includes: 30-Feet of Hose, Skimmer Cone, Penguin Vacuum Head with Ladder Guard, 3 Colored Bow-ties and 3 Colored Eye Sticker Sets. Hayward Model: 100.
feature_bullets: Smart Drive Steering System Provides fast and efficient pool coverage
Three easily interchangeable color customization kits for the bow tie and eyes to personalize your own cleaner
Use the pool filtration system, no tool required for easy installation and ease of use
Three colors customization kits included. More fun with your pool new best friend !
Improves water circulation by pulling water from the pool bottom as it moves

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars94 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
